name: Airtop
semantic_context: Scrape and control any site with Airtop
natural_language_description: 这是 Airtop 节点。主要用于: Scrape and control any site with Airtop

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: session

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: click
available_options: Click an Element (值: click) - Execute a click on an element given a description
Fill Form (值: fill) - Fill a form with the provided information
Hover on an Element (值: hover) - Execute a hover action on an element given a description
Scroll (值: scroll) - Execute a scroll action on the page
Type (值: type) - Execute a Type action on an element given a description

webhookUrl.name: webhookUrl
webhookUrl.description: Webhook URL to invoke the Airtop agent. Visit Airtop Agents for more information.
webhookUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: Webhook URL | 作用: Webhook URL to invoke the Airtop agent. Visit Airtop Agents for more information. | (必填项)

agentParameters.name: agentParameters
agentParameters.description: Agent's input parameters in JSON format. Visit Airtop Agents for more information.
agentParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parameters | 作用: Agent's input parameters in JSON format. Visit Airtop Agents for more information. | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

awaitExecution.name: awaitExecution
awaitExecution.description: Whether to wait for the agent to complete its execution
awaitExecution.natural_language_description: 参数名: Await Agent | 作用: Whether to wait for the agent to complete its execution | 默认值: True

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: Timeout in seconds to wait for the agent to finish
timeout.natural_language_description: 参数名: Timeout | 作用: Timeout in seconds to wait for the agent to finish | 默认值: 600

profileName.name: profileName
profileName.description: The name of the Airtop profile to load or create
profileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Profile Name | 作用: The name of the Airtop profile to load or create | 提示: Learn more about Airtop profiles

saveProfileOnTermination.name: saveProfileOnTermination
saveProfileOnTermination.description: Whether to automatically save the Airtop profile for this session upon termination
saveProfileOnTermination.natural_language_description: 参数名: Save Profile | 作用: Whether to automatically save the Airtop profile for this session upon termination | 默认值: False

record.name: record
record.description: Whether to record the browser session. More details.
record.natural_language_description: 参数名: Record Session | 作用: Whether to record the browser session. More details. | 默认值: False

timeoutMinutes.name: timeoutMinutes
timeoutMinutes.description: Minutes to wait before the session is terminated due to inactivity
timeoutMinutes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Idle Timeout | 作用: Minutes to wait before the session is terminated due to inactivity | 默认值: 10

proxy.name: proxy
proxy.description: Choose how to configure the proxy for this session
proxy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Proxy | 作用: Choose how to configure the proxy for this session | 默认值: none
available_options: None (值: none) - No proxy will be used
Proxy URL (值: proxyUrl) - Use a proxy URL to configure the proxy

proxyConfig.name: proxyConfig
proxyConfig.description: The Airtop-provided configuration to use for the proxy
proxyConfig.natural_language_description: 参数名: Proxy Configuration | 作用: The Airtop-provided configuration to use for the proxy | 默认值: {'country': 'US', 'sticky': True}
available_options: country (值: None) - The country to use for the proxy. Not all countries are guaranteed to provide a proxy. Learn more here.
sticky (值: None) - Whether to try to maintain the same IP address for the duration of the session. Airtop can guarantee that the same IP address will be available for up to a maximum of 30 minutes.

proxyUrl.name: proxyUrl
proxyUrl.description: The URL of the proxy to use
proxyUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: Proxy URL | 作用: The URL of the proxy to use

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: visualScope (值: None) - Defines the strategy for visual analysis of the current window
waitForNavigation (值: None) - The condition to wait for the navigation to complete after an interaction (click, type or hover). Defaults to 'Fully Loaded'.

notice.displayName: Note: This operation is not needed if you enabled 'Save Profile' in the 'Create Session' operation
notice.name: notice
notice.default: This operation will save the profile on session termination
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Note: This operation is not needed if you enabled 'Save Profile' in the 'Create Session' operation | 默认值: This operation will save the profile on session termination

sessionId.name: sessionId
sessionId.description: The ID of the Session to use
sessionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Session ID | 作用: The ID of the Session to use | 默认值: ={{ $json["sessionId"] }} | (必填项)

windowId.name: windowId
windowId.description: The ID of the Window to use
windowId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Window ID | 作用: The ID of the Window to use | 默认值: ={{ $json["windowId"] }} | (必填项)

url.name: url
url.description: URL to load in the window
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: URL to load in the window | (必填项)

getLiveView.name: getLiveView
getLiveView.description: Whether to get the URL of the window's Live View
getLiveView.natural_language_description: 参数名: Get Live View | 作用: Whether to get the URL of the window's Live View | 默认值: False

includeNavigationBar.name: includeNavigationBar
includeNavigationBar.description: Whether to include the navigation bar in the Live View. When enabled, the navigation bar will be visible allowing you to navigate between pages.
includeNavigationBar.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Navigation Bar | 作用: Whether to include the navigation bar in the Live View. When enabled, the navigation bar will be visible allowing you to navigate between pages. | 默认值: False

screenResolution.name: screenResolution
screenResolution.description: The screen resolution of the Live View. Setting a resolution will force the window to open at that specific size.
screenResolution.natural_language_description: 参数名: Screen Resolution | 作用: The screen resolution of the Live View. Setting a resolution will force the window to open at that specific size.

disableResize.name: disableResize
disableResize.description: Whether to disable the window from being resized in the Live View
disableResize.natural_language_description: 参数名: Disable Resize | 作用: Whether to disable the window from being resized in the Live View | 默认值: False

outputImageAsBinary.name: outputImageAsBinary
outputImageAsBinary.description: Whether to output the image as a binary file instead of a base64 encoded string
outputImageAsBinary.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output Binary Image | 作用: Whether to output the image as a binary file instead of a base64 encoded string | 默认值: False

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.description: ID of the file to load into the session
fileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: File ID | 作用: ID of the file to load into the session | (必填项)

outputBinaryFile.name: outputBinaryFile
outputBinaryFile.description: Whether to output the file in binary format if the file is ready for download
outputBinaryFile.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output Binary File | 作用: Whether to output the file in binary format if the file is ready for download | 默认值: False

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 10

sessionIds.name: sessionIds
sessionIds.description: Comma-separated list of Session IDs to filter files by. When empty, all files from all sessions will be returned.
sessionIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Session IDs | 作用: Comma-separated list of Session IDs to filter files by. When empty, all files from all sessions will be returned.

outputSingleItem.name: outputSingleItem
outputSingleItem.description: Whether to output one item containing all files or output each file as a separate item
outputSingleItem.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output Files in Single Item | 作用: Whether to output one item containing all files or output each file as a separate item | 默认值: True

elementDescription.name: elementDescription
elementDescription.description: A specific description of the element to execute the interaction on
elementDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Element Description | 作用: A specific description of the element to execute the interaction on

includeHiddenElements.name: includeHiddenElements
includeHiddenElements.description: Whether to include hidden elements in the interaction
includeHiddenElements.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Hidden Elements | 作用: Whether to include hidden elements in the interaction | 默认值: True

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: Name for the file to upload. For a session, all files loaded should have **unique names**.
fileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Name | 作用: Name for the file to upload. For a session, all files loaded should have **unique names**. | (必填项)

fileType.name: fileType
fileType.description: Choose the type of file to upload. Defaults to 'Customer Upload'.
fileType.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Type | 作用: Choose the type of file to upload. Defaults to 'Customer Upload'. | 默认值: customer_upload

source.name: source
source.description: Source of the file to upload
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source | 作用: Source of the file to upload | 默认值: url

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property containing the file data
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary Property | 作用: Name of the binary property containing the file data | 默认值: data | (必填项)

triggerFileInputParameter.name: triggerFileInputParameter
triggerFileInputParameter.description: Whether to automatically trigger the file input dialog in the current window. If disabled, the file will only be uploaded to the session without opening the file input dialog.
triggerFileInputParameter.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger File Input | 作用: Whether to automatically trigger the file input dialog in the current window. If disabled, the file will only be uploaded to the session without opening the file input dialog. | 默认值: True

sessionMode.name: sessionMode
sessionMode.description: Choose between creating a new session or using an existing one
sessionMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Session Mode | 作用: Choose between creating a new session or using an existing one | 默认值: existing
available_options: Automatically Create Session (值: new) - Automatically create a new session and window for this operation
Use Existing Session (值: existing) - Use an existing session and window for this operation

autoTerminateSession.name: autoTerminateSession
autoTerminateSession.description: Whether to terminate the session after the operation is complete. When disabled, you must manually terminate the session. By default, idle sessions timeout after 10 minutes
autoTerminateSession.natural_language_description: 参数名: Auto-Terminate Session | 作用: Whether to terminate the session after the operation is complete. When disabled, you must manually terminate the session. By default, idle sessions timeout after 10 minutes | 默认值: True

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.description: The prompt to query the page content
prompt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Prompt | 作用: The prompt to query the page content | (必填项)

clickType.name: clickType
clickType.description: The type of click to perform. Defaults to left click.
clickType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Click Type | 作用: The type of click to perform. Defaults to left click. | 默认值: click

formData.name: formData
formData.description: The information to fill into the form written in natural language
formData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Data | 作用: The information to fill into the form written in natural language | (必填项)

scrollingMode.name: scrollingMode
scrollingMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Scroll Mode | 作用: Choose the mode of scrolling | 默认值: automatic | (必填项)
available_options: Automatic (值: automatic) - Describe with natural language the element to scroll to
Manual (值: manual) - Define the direction and amount to scroll by

scrollToElement.name: scrollToElement
scrollToElement.description: A natural language description of the element to scroll to
scrollToElement.natural_language_description: 参数名: Element Description | 作用: A natural language description of the element to scroll to | (必填项)

scrollToEdge.name: scrollToEdge
scrollToEdge.description: The direction to scroll to. When 'Scroll By' is defined, 'Scroll To Edge' action will be executed first, then 'Scroll By' action.
scrollToEdge.natural_language_description: 参数名: Scroll To Edge | 作用: The direction to scroll to. When 'Scroll By' is defined, 'Scroll To Edge' action will be executed first, then 'Scroll By' action. | 默认值: {}

scrollBy.name: scrollBy
scrollBy.description: The amount to scroll by. When 'Scroll To Edge' is defined, 'Scroll By' action will be executed after 'Scroll To Edge'.
scrollBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Scroll By | 作用: The amount to scroll by. When 'Scroll To Edge' is defined, 'Scroll By' action will be executed after 'Scroll To Edge'. | 默认值: {}
available_options: scrollValues (值: None) - The amount in pixels or percentage to scroll by

scrollWithin.name: scrollWithin
scrollWithin.description: Scroll within an element on the page
scrollWithin.natural_language_description: 参数名: Scrollable Area | 作用: Scroll within an element on the page

text.name: text
text.description: The text to type into the browser window
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The text to type into the browser window | (必填项)

pressEnterKey.name: pressEnterKey
pressEnterKey.description: Whether to press the Enter key after typing the text
pressEnterKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Press Enter Key | 作用: Whether to press the Enter key after typing the text | 默认值: False
